entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of light snow late this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing overnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 March 2023
